channel.title: [562]How do you add hand cannon special attack? Please Answer![Rs2hd]
channel.description: Hello, ive been trying to find a hand cannon spec to my 562 server, and idk how do add it on my server, any ideas?

item.title: [562]How do you add hand cannon special attack? Please Answer![Rs2hd]
item.dc:creator: @julie101 julie101
item.description:
@julie101 wrote:

[quote=“itai, post:5, topic:361327”][quote author=TheNewCoder link=topic=457606.msg3349779#msg3349779 date=1285182238]
you gotta do server sided/client sided. add the emote ids for the hand cannon in the client.java for the source,
and also add a public boolean into the client.java with the emote ids, item id of the item ,with gfx u need it to do, what percentage + you want it to hit.(client sided)

[/quote]
You know this is 562 protocol right…?[/quote]

all the 562 sources i have load like one time a day its freaking stupid does yours load every time?

Read full topic
item.source: [562]How do you add hand cannon special attack? Please Answer![Rs2hd]
